projects.name: Online Course App
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Android application aimed at enhancing the learning experience for users. The app offers a variety of features to facilitate seamless learning. The app offers convenient access to video lectures and PDFs, catering to diverse user preferences. Users can also interact with workboards, quizzes, and music. Proficient in Kotlin for Android application development, utilized extensively in Online Course App to implement key features such as easy access to course materials, workboards, quizzes.

projects.name: Pizza Delivery Management System
projects.description: Pizza delivery management system developed using Python and SQL to streamline operation for a Pizza delivery service. Designed implemented backend Functionalities using Python, including order management, inventory tracking. Integrated real time order tracking features for customers and delivery personnel, enhancing overall service efficiency and customer satisfaction.

projects.name: Student Report Management System

Implemented robust functionalities allowing users to add, edit and delete student data Upgraded the existing code to enhance error handling, resulting in a reliable and error-free Application.
